<div style=\"visibility:hidden\">Created by Cheten Tshering on 15/10/2020</div>
<div class=\"page-break\">
\t<div id=\"header-html\" class=\"hidden-pdf\">
    {%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}

    </p>
</div>
<div class=\"print-heading\">
<div  style=\"text-align: center;\">
\t<h3>HS AND TEA ALLOWANCE</h3>
<h5>
\t<u>
\t{{doc.name}}
\t</u>
</h5>
</div>
<br/>
</div>
